DataElement.preferredName: Negation Attendance Employed Or School Due To Impairment Or Health Problem Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether you do not attend work or school due to impairment or health problems.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Negation Attendance Employed Or School Due To Impairment Or Health Problem
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of being present (at a meeting or event etc.):The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An educational institution._Caused by or resulting from._Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of being present (at a meeting or event etc.)

In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. Concepts.definition: The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
